column1: AccountId_TVCORE__c(Account ID) - Look Up to Account Master - refer to account ID. It is the primary account
column2: AffiliatedAccountId_TVCORE__c(Account ID for Related Account) - Lookup to account Master
column3: CreatedById(User) - LookUp to the User Master . If the user is not present then default to System userid
column7: Name (SFDC reference ID of the record). Pleae store in Omni but hide the field
